short_summary: FCC currently has 84 offices across Canada that are monitored by an alarm service provider. The contract with this provider will be expiring in October 2024, and FCC is requesting interested alarm service providers to submit a proposal to provide alarm intrusion services. The number of offices and office locations are subject to change at sole discretion of FCC.
description: Farm Credit Canada (FCC) is seeking proposals from interested alarm service providers to supply alarm intrusion services to its 84 offices across Canada. The offices are equipped with various hardware and sensors. The selected provider will have the opportunity to configure the security technology for each location. Tenders can be submitted directly through the provided link. The notice mentions a trade agreement with the European Union (CETA), which implies that EU-based firms may participate.

full_summary:
### Farm Credit Canada (FCC) Alarm Service Provider

#### Tender Information

*   **Title (English)/Titre (Français)**: Farm Credit Canada (FCC) Alarm Service Provider / Fournisseur de services d’alarme pour Financement agricole Canada (FAC)
*   **Reference Number (English)/Numero DeReference (Français)**: MX-43071622998
*   **Amendment Number/Numéro De Modification**: 3
*   **Solicitation Number/Numéro De Sollicitation**: PS24-FS-012
*   **Publication Date / Date Publique**: 2024-03-22
*   **Tender Closing Date/Appel Offres Date Cloture**: 2024-05-06 16:00:00
*   **Amendment Date / Date Modification**: 2024-05-06
*   **Expected Contract Start Date / Date Debut Contrat Prevue**: 2024-10-01
*   **Expected Contract End Date / Date Fin Contrat Prevue**: 2029-09-30
*   **Tender Status (English) / Appel Offres Statut (Français)**: Expired / Expiré

#### Tender Details

*   **GSIN/NIBS**: None
*   **Procurement Category / Categorie Approvisionnement**: GD, SRV
*   **Procurement Method / Méthode D`Approvisionnement**: Competitive - Open Bidding / Concurrentielle - Invitation Ouverte A Soumissionner

#### Contracting Entity Information

*   **Contracting Entity Name (English)/Nom Entit Contractante (Français)**: Farm Credit Canada (FCC)
*   **Contracting Entity Address / Adresse Entit Contractante**: 1800 Hamilton Street
*   **Contracting Entity Authority / Autorité Entit Contractante**: Regina, Saskatchewan
*   **Contracting Entity Postal Code / Code Postal Entit Contractante**: S4P 4L3
*   **Contracting Entity Country / Pays Entit Contractante**: Canada

#### Selection Criteria / Criteres De Selection

Please refer to the solicitation document for information on the selection criteria used to evaluate offers.

#### Trade Agreements / Accords Commerciaux
